name: 3 Abyss Get Gud
author: 》3K《 All Day
notes: Pretty standard build. The Valiant Souls box didn't drop yet so Geargia wasn't a threat. I was able to get KoG with this within 2 days. First turn Whale usually led to a scoop. Todays meta some cards would definitely change to adapt to the geargia meta which is this decks biggest problem.
